predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, the Government of Canada will announce and implement retaliatory tariffs (surtaxes) on selected U.S. goods in response to new U.S. tariffs.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Canada Gazette notice or Government of Canada/Department of Finance press release published by 2025-11-30 listing new retaliatory tariffs/surtaxes on U.S.-origin goods explicitly in response to U.S. tariff actions.
monitoring_signals: Statements from Canada’s Finance Minister/Global Affairs Canada
U.S. Federal Register tariff notices and effective dates
Industry lobbying and Canadian media leaks
Retaliation timelines used in 2018 steel/aluminum disputes
USD/CAD reaction and Canadian parliamentary Q&A
predictions.rationale: Political reciprocity and recent precedent make near-term Canadian retaliation likely.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-24 close to 2025-11-30 close, Berkshire Hathaway Class B (BRK-B) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points on an adjusted close basis.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted close data for BRK-B and SPY, compute % change from 2025-10-24 close to 2025-11-30 close. (BRK-B % change) - (SPY % change) <= -2.0 pp confirms.
monitoring_signals: Mega-cap tech earnings momentum vs. value/cyclicals
10-year Treasury yield and curve shifts
Catastrophe loss updates for insurance
Apple position headlines
S&P 500 breadth indicators (A/D line, equal-weight vs. cap-weight)
predictions.rationale: Leadership is narrow and tech-heavy; Berkshire’s portfolio tends to lag in such tapes.

predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing Prices Index for October 2025 will print at or above 56.0.
predictions.verification_criteria: The ISM Report On Business—Manufacturing for October 2025 shows Prices Index ≥ 56.0.
monitoring_signals: WTI/Brent price trends
Regional Fed ‘prices paid’ subindices (Philly, Empire, Dallas)
Freight rates and supplier delivery times
USD moves impacting import costs
predictions.rationale: Energy and freight keep input costs firm despite mixed demand.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 4.40% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED series DGS2 daily close ≤ 4.40% on any date through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: PCE and CPI prints vs. expectations
Fed communication and fed funds futures path
Labor data (NFP, claims) surprises
Treasury auction outcomes and term premium
predictions.rationale: Disinflation pulses and dovish repricing can briefly pull the 2Y lower.

predictions.text: NYMEX RBOB gasoline front-month futures (ticker: RB) will settle at or below $2.10 per gallon on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: CME official daily settlement for the front-month RB contract ≤ $2.10/gal by 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: EIA gasoline inventories and days of supply
Refinery utilization and unplanned outages
Gasoline crack spreads
WTI/Brent prices and USD strength
Seasonal demand trends
predictions.rationale: Post-summer seasonality and adequate stocks pressure gasoline futures.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, Fluor Corporation (FLR) will announce a review of strategic alternatives for its NuScale stake or a formal plan to monetize/divest a material portion of that stake.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Fluor press release, Form 8-K, or investor presentation explicitly launching a ‘strategic alternatives’ process or detailing a monetization/divestiture plan for its NuScale (SMR) equity stake.
monitoring_signals: Activist filings/letters (e.g., Starboard)
Board/management commentary
NuScale project pipeline and financing needs
FLR share price performance and capital allocation updates
predictions.rationale: Activist pressure and capital recycling incentives drive a higher likelihood of action.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will designate at least one China-based entity under a Russia-related sanctions program for supporting Russia’s defense or industrial base.
predictions.verification_criteria: A U.S. Treasury/OFAC press release or SDN update names a PRC-based entity and explicitly cites Russia-related sanctions for support to Russia’s defense/industrial base.
monitoring_signals: U.S.–China diplomatic statements on export controls
Coordinated Russia sanctions packages with allies
BIS Entity List actions
Media leaks about PRC intermediaries aiding Russia
predictions.rationale: Enforcement cadence increasingly targets PRC intermediaries aiding Russia’s war effort.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-Year TIPS breakeven inflation rate (FRED: T10YIE) will close at or below 2.20% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: FRED T10YIE daily close ≤ 2.20% on any date through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Oil price trends and gasoline futures
Inflation swaps/BEI term structure
CPI/PCE surprises
USD and real yield movements
predictions.rationale: Disinflation and stronger USD could compress breakevens briefly.

predictions.text: USD/CAD (Yahoo Finance: CAD=X) will trade at or above 1.3800 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Yahoo Finance intraday/high data for CAD=X shows a trade ≥ 1.3800 on any UTC day through 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: Escalation/retaliation in U.S.–Canada tariffs
BoC guidance and Canadian data surprises
Oil price weakness
U.S. macro outperformance and DXY strength
predictions.rationale: Tariff friction and softer oil create upside pressure on USD/CAD.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-24 close to 2025-11-30 close, iShares Russell 2000 ETF (IWM) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 1.0 percentage point on an adjusted close basis.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using Yahoo Finance adjusted close data for IWM and SPY, compute % change from 2025-10-24 close to 2025-11-30 close. (IWM % change) - (SPY % change) ≤ -1.0 pp confirms.
monitoring_signals: Earnings breadth and forward guidance dispersion
High-yield spreads and small-cap credit conditions
Rate volatility (MOVE) and 10Y yields
AI-led mega-cap outperformance persistence
predictions.rationale: Large-cap quality leadership and tighter credit weigh on small caps.
